tool_description: Our Messaging API designed to fullfill most of your use cases and can be easily integrate to any of the system. We can send single message to both private and public channel in your workspace by adding the channel as slack in messaging API.
name: D7 Slack
title: D7 Slack

api_list.name: Send Slack Message
api_list.description: Our Messaging API designed to fullfill most of your use cases and can be easily integrate to any of the system. We can send single message to both private and public channel in your workspace by adding the channel as slack in messaging API. The D7Messaging App should be added to your workspace before sending slack messages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-slack.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-slack.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-slack.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-slack.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
